name: Cube Man Fighting: Pixel World
description:
Cube men are fighting! Play with your friend or with a bot and win the battle! Welcome to an incredible boxing championship! You are the head trainer, and your goal is to help your boxer win and become a champion. Cube Man Fighting: Pixel World – your action is smooth, your punches are strong, you are the greatest warrior! Show, who is the boss here!

You can play with your friend on one device, or you can play alone. First, choose your character and start the game. Slide to move your character, and try to hit your opponent. Avoid his punches, try to win every fight. When a fighter gets injured, a part of his body becomes red. This health indicator will help you to understand who’s winning right now. Good luck you!

Cube Man Fighting: Pixel World game features:
- Fighting game for two player or for one player;
- Amazing cubic design;
- Smooth animation and great graphics;
- Easy-to-use sliding controls.

First fight is ready to start, and are you ready? Cube Man Fighting: Pixel World– train hard, become the world famous boxer!
